title: Trump Misstates Facts on NC Immigration Case
summary: Trump incorrectly linked a Charlotte murder to open borders, when the suspect was a U.S. citizen.
charlotte_impact: Highlights the ongoing debate around immigration and the accuracy of political statements.

title: Swimming Pool Filter Maker Operates Plant in Clemmons, NC
summary: Hayward, a Charlotte-based company, is a major employer in Clemmons with over 1,000 workers.
charlotte_impact: Demonstrates the economic importance of manufacturing in smaller North Carolina towns.

title: Trade Shows in Charlotte Leverage Custom Canopy Tents
summary: Exhibitors in Charlotte trade shows focus on flexibility, visibility, and ROI with custom canopy tents.
charlotte_impact: Shows how businesses are adapting marketing strategies to maximize impact at trade events.

title: Mosaic Capital Partners Seeks Vice President
summary: Charlotte-based Mosaic Capital Partners is looking for a VP of Business Development.
charlotte_impact: Indicates growth and investment activity in the Charlotte private equity sector.

title: Florence Airport Passengers Increased in 2025
summary: Florence Regional Airport saw increased passenger traffic but lost an American Airlines flight to Charlotte.
charlotte_impact: Reflects the changing dynamics of regional air travel and connectivity.

title: Women Tortured and Killed Girl in NC
summary: Three women in Charlotte are charged with the child abuse death of a girl, allegedly kept in a dog crate.
charlotte_impact: Highlights a horrific case of child abuse and the need for vigilance in protecting vulnerable children.

title: Homeowners Reassessing When to Sell
summary: Homeowners in Charlotte, NC are reassessing when to sell due to shifting market conditions.
charlotte_impact: Reflects the changing dynamics of the real estate market and its impact on homeowners.

title: KPN Facilitates $20M in Acquisitions
summary: KPN Consulting Services facilitated $20M in acquisitions, expanding economic development partnerships in Charlotte.
charlotte_impact: Demonstrates the role of consulting firms in driving economic growth and business expansion.

title: Kannapolis Honors Corine Cannon with Bridge Designation
summary: Kannapolis leaders honor Corine Cannon, 106, for her involvement in the pursuit of justice.
charlotte_impact: Celebrates the contributions of a long-time community member and her dedication to justice.

title: Woman Dies After Assault in East Charlotte
summary: A woman died weeks after an assault in east Charlotte; the suspect is in custody.
charlotte_impact: Highlights the issue of violent crime in the city and the efforts to bring perpetrators to justice.

title: Man Arrested in Missouri for NC Child Rape Charges
summary: A man was arrested in Missouri to face child rape charges from 2018 in Gastonia, North Carolina.
charlotte_impact: Illustrates the long reach of the law and the pursuit of justice in child abuse cases.

title: Mother and Boyfriend Accused of Assaulting 1-Year-Old
summary: A mother and her boyfriend are accused of assaulting a 1-year-old in Burke County, causing a fractured arm.
charlotte_impact: Raises concerns about child safety and the potential for abuse within families.

title: Duke Lacrosse Accuser Released After Murder Sentence
summary: Crystal Mangum, who falsely accused Duke lacrosse players, was released after serving 13 years for murder.
charlotte_impact: Recalls a controversial case and highlights the consequences of false accusations and violent crime.

title: Dollar General Shooting Leaves 1 Hurt
summary: A shooting at a Dollar General in Stanley, NC, left one person injured; the suspect was arrested.
charlotte_impact: Reflects the ongoing issue of gun violence and its impact on local communities.

title: Protest Over Alleged ICE Detention Center
summary: A protest occurred outside a Charlotte developer's office over an alleged ICE detention center in Concord.
charlotte_impact: Demonstrates community concerns and activism related to immigration enforcement policies.
